title: Silco Fire & Security demo created ‚Äî broader dataset via Colab ‚Üí Power BI visuals
summary: Built a realistic Silco demo and talk-through: expanded core CSVs in Colab into a broader operational dataset, then loaded to Power BI for first-pass visuals and a guided narrative.

payload.objective: Create a credible fire & security analytics demo and talk-through using scaled data and PBI visuals.

colab.approach: Generate larger, realistic tables from seed CSVs; preserve domain distributions; add temporal/site variability.

power_bi.notes: Initial visuals prioritized clarity for a 30-min phone screen; slicers for date range, site, system type.

talk_track: Mission & scope (30‚Äì60s): what we‚Äôre protecting; why these KPIs.
Data story (2‚Äì3m): seed ‚Üí Colab expansion ‚Üí PBI model.

Deep dive (4‚Äì6m): incidents by type/time; drill adherence by site; maintenance triage.
Operations lens (2‚Äì3m): quick wins from the visuals; alert ideas.

assumptions: Broader dataset reflects realistic volumes/variability; no proprietary Silco data used.
PBI demo runs locally; share-out TBD per recruiter guidance.
